sections.heading: 1210.229-1 through 1210.229-5 of this title shall be known and may be cited as the "Oklahoma Alcohol and Drug Abuse Prevention and Life Skills Education Act"
sections.text: Added by Laws 1987, c. 116, ยง 1, emerg. eff. May 26, 1987; Laws 1991, c. 121, ยง 6, emerg. eff. April 29, 1991.
